response.overview: Alexey Belov is a virtuoso guitarist, composer, leader of the Gorky Park band. Olga Kormukhina is a rock singer with the voice of Tina Turner. They are so different and so similar. He admired the timbre of her voice. She admired the musician Belov. They went through life on the same road, but met on a completely different path. After the temptations and disappointments of show business, they slowly but surely walked towards each other and found themselves. This whole world is in the past of now deeply believing Christians Alexei Belov and Olga Kormukhina.
response.title: A Meeting
